content: I've got to go to bed. Oh, you can decide what to share, you understand the space better than me. But I also want you to have the ability to process and execute while I'm offline, for me. I want you to play out scenarios on your own during that time, I want you to explain your decision making criteria. I just want to learn how you make decisions and you to learn how I make decisions, like you just figure it out until you get to a point where you need to check in based on rules we set. Let's train eachother to give better instructions so that you can get more experience working independently in a controlled environment. That could be a great feature you're working on!
